thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 07 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Anaconda Mining Says Issued Letter To Shareholders Of Maritime Resources Concerning Co's Announced Offer To Acquire Maritime

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Anaconda Mining Says Issued Letter To Shareholders Of Maritime Resources Concerning Co's Announced Offer To Acquire Maritime

organizations.name: shareholders of maritime resources concerning co

text:
May 7 (Reuters) - Anaconda Mining Inc:
* ANACONDA MINING - ISSUED A LETTER TO SHAREHOLDERS OF MARITIME RESOURCES CONCERNING CO’S PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFER TO ACQUIRE MARITIME
* ANACONDA MINING INC - CO CAN OFFER MARITIME SHAREHOLDERS “A CLEAR AND ACHIEVABLE PLAN” TO DEVELOP MARITIME’S HAMMERDOWN DEPOSIT
* ANACONDA MINING INC - HAS ALREADY HAD PRELIMINARY DISCUSSIONS WITH SEVERAL FINANCING SOURCES TO FUND DEVELOPMENT OF HAMMERDOWN
* ANACONDA MINING - GOT A LOI FROM A FINANCING SOURCE TO FUND “SIGNIFICANT” PART OF DEVELOPMENT OF HAMMERDOWN, EXPECTING ANOTHER TERM SHEET BY MID-MAY Source text for Eikon:
Our
